page.title: 08NAMES-PLACE,FIELD-CANON PYON
page.content: {Canon Pyon}is in{Grimsworth Hundred. {Pyon }has derived from Pionie,Pevne, Peuna,Pionia,Pyone.Peo and pie was 'insect'in Old English.Presumably the Pyon villages were gnat infested. {Canon Pyon}belonged to Hereford Cathedral.{Westhope}means western valley. {Field Names}in km.squares 5 and 9 of D-block:Bottom Plock,Orchard,Rickyard Field,House Meadow,Top Plock,Top Orchard,Long Meadow,Middle Field,The Shrewd,Shrewd.These are fields belonging to{Court Farm,}which is situated close to the church. { {Field Names }in km.square 12 of D-block:Bogs,Side Field,Pyon Field, Brook Meadow,Orchard,Franklins,Sixteen Acres,Barn Field.Long Field,Square Field,Middle Slade,Griffith's Field, Top Slade, Well Meadow. These fields belong to{Lower Derndale Farm.
